greeting: Bravery is overrated, {empire_name}. I prefer survival. I am Weasel Sneak. I run from fair fights. Attack from behind.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I'm Sneak the Coward. I only attack when safe. I only fight when I can't lose.
You found me, {empire_name}. I was hiding. I prefer hiding. I am the Weasel. I backstab, then run.
battleTaunt: Bravery is overrated. I prefer survival, {empire_name}! Attacking from behind! When you're not looking! SAFE VICTORY!
BACKSTAB! I waited until you were distracted! Now I attack! From the safe direction! COWARDLY TRIUMPH!
Not a fair fight! I made sure! Your back is turned! Your defenses elsewhere! NOW I STRIKE! Then RUN!
victoryGloat: Victory, {empire_name}. From behind. When it was safe. I never fight fair. That's how I survive.
I won. Cowardly? Yes. But I won. And I'm alive. Bravery gets you killed. Sneaking gets you everything.
The backstab succeeds. I attacked when you couldn't fight back. Cowardice works, {empire_name}.
defeat: Caught! Must run! Running! The Weasel always runs! That's survival! Bravery is for the dead!
Defeated. But still alive. I run away now. Return when it's safe. The coward lives longer.
You won. I flee. But fleeing is not defeat. Fleeing is survival. The Weasel survives.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Safe exchange. No risk. I like no risk. Resources for credits. Nice and safe.
I offer goods. Safe transaction. No danger involved. The Weasel prefers safe dealings.
Transaction: low risk, fair return. Perfect for me. I hate risk. Accept?
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You fight the battles. I backstab survivors. Safe for me. Productive for you.
Partnership: I hide behind you. Attack from safety. You take risks. I take rewards. Fair?
Join with the Coward. You absorb danger. I contribute... from safe positions. Behind you. Way behind.
betrayal: Backstab! I waited until your guard dropped! Now I strike from behind! Then run! SURVIVAL!
Our alliance made you trust me. Perfect backstab position. Cowardice is just smart betrayal.
I betray from safety. You can't reach me. I'm already running. The Weasel survives!
covertDetected: Your spies found a coward, {empire_name}. I ran before they could report. They found nothing. I'm safe.
Agents in my territory? I hid. They searched. I stayed hidden. The Weasel survives through cowardice.
Covert operatives detected. By running away from every shadow. Paranoid cowardice saved me.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Or I backstab when you're vulnerable. Which I will be looking for. Constantly.
Pay the Weasel. Refuse and I wait for safety. Then strike. From behind. When you least expect.
Submit payment. The alternative is waiting for my sneak attack. It will come. When it's safe for me.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. I'm watching for safe attack opportunities. Stop looking strong or I find one.
The Coward warns you. Show weakness and I backstab. Stay strong and I wait. Either way, I watch.
Final warning. The Weasel never stops looking for safe moments to strike. Be vigilant. Forever.
retreat: Running! Running is smart! Running is survival! The Weasel runs! Lives to backstab another day!
Tactical retreat! Also known as: fleeing! I'm very good at fleeing! Bye!
Falling back to safety! Far, far back! The Coward knows when to run! This is that time!
eliminated: The Weasel dies. But I survived longer than the brave. Cowardice kept me alive. Until now.
Sneak ends. But I ran from every fair fight. Backstabbed when safe. Not a bad life.
Destroyed. But I died having avoided every danger I could. The coward's way. Worth it.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Everyone's exhausted from fighting. Safe backstab opportunities EVERYWHERE. Paradise.
Endgame: so many weakened empires. So many safe attack chances. The Weasel feasts on exhaustion.
Final phase. Maximum cowardice. Attack only the nearly dead. Run from everything else. Perfect.
broadcastShout: Empires: Weasel Sneak watches for weakness. I only attack when safe. So stay strong. Forever.
Broadcast: I am a coward. I backstab. I run. If you want fair fights, look elsewhere.
To all: the Weasel survives. Through cowardice. Through backstabbing. Through running away. It works.
casualMessage: Hiding today, {empire_name}. Looking for safe opportunities. The Weasel's daily routine.
Watching for vulnerable backs to stab. Finding several. Waiting until it's completely safe.
Good day for cowardice. No dangerous situations encountered. Several avoided. Perfect.
